channel.title: A few quick questions
channel.description:
Hello community! Iv been lurking here for a while now & finally decided to open up my own server again. I haven't opened one since 07ish, so I'm way rusty & very far behind on the times. So I have a few questions.
Firstly, how and where do I add in commands? I have the command I want to add, but don't mow where to put it.
Port forwarding (in progress)
Where do I go to edit item damages, armor bonuses, ect?
Where do I go to add in monster respawns
How do I edit shops
Andddd that's about it for now.

item.title: A few quick questions
item.dc:creator: @Blind_Gnome Blind Gnome
item.description:
@Blind_Gnome wrote:

If your using a 317 source, search for item.cfg which is the config folder, and do Ctrl+f and search for your item(example bandos boots search bandos_boots)
Also you can add Npc’s the same way but in the npcspawn.cfg/NPC.cfg(just depends on your source)

Theres programs that can help you edit your shops but the shops are in the shop config file.

I’d use Notepad++ if you don’t have it, it lets you edit multiple files and is easier to work with
http://notepad-plus-plus.org/

[size=12pt]Google/Youtube is your friend[/size]

Read full topic
